recipe.title: Precise Avocado Toast (Capricorn) Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Scoop the avocado into a medium bowl. Season with salt and add the lemon juice. Mash until smooth.
Spread the avocado on the slice of toast. Line 8 chickpeas at the top of the toast, then 6 edamame underneath, then repeat with the remaining chickpeas and edamame.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Scoop the avocado into a medium bowl.
Season with salt and add the lemon juice.
Spread the avocado on the slice of toast.
Line 8 chickpeas at the top of the toast, then 6 edamame underneath, then repeat with the remaining chickpeas and edamame.
